For anyone wondering how to get this to work, just open afo-xvid-devil 001 in WinRAR and it extracts the .avi. Just find the folder it's located in, copy and paste it to your desktop or your videos folder, and delete the original .avi.

For those who's operating systems/winrars won't recognize the file(s)...

-Right click the first file (001)
-Select 'open with', winrar will not be listed under the programs to open this file
-Select winrar as the program in which to open the file
-Once in winrar just simply choose to extract to a specified location, done and done

and now you should have one long 698mb avi file of "The Devil and Daniel Johnston"

This fucker Daniel Johnston is back in the mental hospital for finger-fucking a little girl, lol.

His former manager uploaded this after Dan's brother brought complaint. The poor guy never made much off Dan, but was kind enough to give some rare master tapes (cassettes, lol!) back to the Johnston family.

But paybacks are hell baby, and so now we can sift through Daniel Johnston's over hyped "genius" for free.

Daniel Johnston is currently incarcerated for a rape spree upon age 8 - 11 girls in 1984, whereby Dan would lure girls into his corn dog trailer and tie them up at a traveling carnival.
